type.description: The type of the event, always `response.reasoning.delta`.

sequence_number.description: The sequence number of the event that was emitted.

item_id.description: The ID of the item that was updated.

output_index.description: The index of the output item that was updated.

content_index.description: The index of the reasoning content that was updated.

delta.description: The reasoning text delta that was appended.

obfuscation.description: An obfuscation string that was added to pad the event payload.

title: Response reasoning delta event
description: A streaming event that indicated reasoning text was incrementally added.
